Dr. Julius KöpkeDipl.-Ing. Dr. Julius Köpke Assoc.-Prof. Dipl.-Ing. Dr. Julius KöpkeAssociate Professor+43 463 2700 3531Julius [dot] Koepke [at] aau [dot] atS.2.73Campus-Portal profile | Courses | Research Research Interests: (inter-organizational) Business Processes with a focus on Smart Contracts and Blockchain Technology. Application of Semantic Technologies for (data) Interoperability Artifact-Centric Business Processes, Business Processes and Data Management Regarding the application of semantic technologies my major contributions are an expressive, declarative and still light-weight annotation method for XML-Schema and corresponding matching algorithms for generating document transformations. In the field of business processes my major contributions are methods for the alignment of local processes according to a global process, a theory of equivalence transformations for the implementation of inter-organizational data-flow and methods to generate high quality translations of activity-centric processes to artifact centric processes incorporating domain knowledge. Recent Publications: J. Köpke, G. Meroni, M. Salnitri. Designing Secure Business Processes for Blockchains with SecBPMN2BC. Future Generation Computer Systems  (in Press). J. Köpke A. Brdanin.
